group_1.textCenter: Kokoro! And Aimi, and Masara... You guys all@showed up!

group_1.narration: These three are Magical Girls who go to@Chuo Academy. I met them because of these@cute lace accessories that Kokoro made!

group_1.textRight: Thanks for inviting us along! Thrifting@events are really fun.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I usually only pay attention to my@favorite brands, so this is all so new!
Aw, that makes me so happy to hear!
How about you, Masara? Ya having fun?

group_1.textRight: I'm not sure if "fun" is the right word, but @I don't necessarily want to go home.

group_1.textLeft: I think that means you're having fun.
If you weren't interested at all you wouldn't@have shown up in the first place.

group_1.textRight: What I am really interested in...
Is what this "kawaii" thing that Ashley's@so obsessed with is.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, right! When I was searching around@earlier, I found some cute stuff to show you!
I'll share my unique brand of kawaii with all@of you guys!

group_1.narration: First up is Kokoro!@A high-waisted skirt with a gorgeous flare,@paired with a white fitted blouse!@What makes it is the bows on the skirt!@It's subtle, but still makes a statement!

group_1.textRight: Wow! It's so cute... And really mature, too.

group_1.textLeft: It's the perfect outfit for going to a@restaurant that's on the classier side.

group_1.textRight: I'll try wearing it next time I go out to@eat with my family. Thanks!

group_1.narration: Next, here's what I picked out for Aimi!@This sweet outfit is PERFECT for a date!@It's got lots of frills and lace, but there@is an elegance to its chic color palette.@It'll be a new look for you to show off!

group_1.textRight: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]That's so kawaii! [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:eyeClose_1][chara:302301:cheek_2][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]If I wear this, then Hayato@is definitely gonna... Ehe...he he he...

group_1.textLeft: Uh...

group_1.textRight: Give her a second, she'll come back to us.

group_1.textLeft: A-anyway, last up is Masara!

This is just my personal preference, but...[chara:305201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101700:cheek_2][chara:305201:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:305201:eyeClose_1][chara:305201:lipSynch_1]@I went with a pure white dress for you!
Cause it totally suits you!

group_1.textRight: I get what she means. [chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]Don't you, Aimi?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Mwuh?
Y-yeah! Masara would look amazing in a @white dress.

group_1.textRight: I see. So this is what everyone thinks of as@"kawaii"...
I suppose I'll try it on.
Are you buying anything for yourself, Ash?

group_1.textLeft: Not yet! I was thinking I'd get a dress from @this stall...
But when I was looking around earlier I @couldn't choose between these ones...

group_1.textRight: The one on the left's cute, isn't it?
Yeah, and it's your fave color, too!

group_1.textLeft: You've convinced me! If both of you are gonna@recommend it, I'll get this one!
And now here's where I gotta excuse myself.
I gotta nail my look for the contest if@I wanna win!

group_1.textRight: Huh? Oh, are you taking part in the used@clothes contest, Ash?

group_1.textLeft: Yup! And I've got my eyes on the prize!
Thank youuuuuu! [chara:305201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101700:cheek_1][chara:305201:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:305201:eyeClose_0][chara:305201:lipSynch_1]Off I go!

group_1.textRight: This. I think...Ashley would like it.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, you aren't wrong! It's mega kawaii!
